name: Skullz Kickz
description:
Simple but addictive. Kick the skull by tapping on the screen. But you have to be fast enough to not lose the skull. After a while the second player comes in and you have to watch for two. For how long will you be able to keep the skull from touching the ground and beat the highscore?
«Skullz Kicks» is a one-touch-app with a lot of fun in a nice vintage retro-pixel-style.

For the cultivated Skull-Lover out there – an other fine «Z-App» from Skullz23.
